participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for arts and animals.
participant_1.background: I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery. I am the oldest sibling. I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests. I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting. I was sad when my cat died last year.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and supportive, enjoys spending time with family and friends.
participant_2.background: I have breakfast with my brothers and talk about our day. I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings. I've been single my whole life, but I'm hoping to find someone special one day. I usually dye my hair with natural colors, but I'm open to trying new things. I remember playing street hockey with my friends in the summer.

content.text: It's going well! I'm having breakfast with my brothers and we're talking about our day. What about you?
Not bad! I'm just getting ready for the day. What do you do for a living?
I'm a wedding planner! I love helping people create their dream weddings.
Oh wow, that sounds like a really fun job! I've always wanted to be a wedding planner.
It is! It's really rewarding to see your clients' visions come to life.
I bet! Have you ever helped plan a wedding for a celebrity?
No, I haven't! But that would be amazing!
It would be! I think I'd be too nervous to work with a celebrity.
I think I would be too, but it would still be really cool.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play street hockey with my friends in the summer.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I knew how to play street hockey.
It's not too hard to learn! You should give it a try!
I might just have to do that!
